name: Domain the Trading Card Game
description:
Indie digital TCG. Domain is an online strategy game I made. In alpha but fully playable for free. Please play, sign up, and give feedback on the forums. Thanks in advance!

- Simple rules, infinite depth.

- Online multiplayer and single player.

- Chess like strategy, crushing difficulty.

- 100 unique, interesting cards with more to come.

https://enterthedomains.com

https://discord.gg/UYtABhB
